tasks.title: Phase 1: Foundation - Setup Astro & Rust/WGPU bridge
tasks.description: Establish the communication loop between the browser (DOM/Astro) and the Rust/WGPU engine.
tasks.details: Initialize or verify the Rust WASM project structure. Ensure the build pipeline (wasm-pack) is correctly set up. Create a basic 'hello world' invocation from the Astro frontend to the Rust backend to verify the bridge.

tasks.title: Phase 1: Foundation - Implement Basic WGPU Renderer
tasks.description: Create a basic render loop in Rust/WGPU targeting a Canvas in Astro.
tasks.details:
Search for 'WASM render loop templates' or existing wgpu-on-web examples. Implement a basic WGPU surface configuration and render loop (e.g., clearing the screen to a specific color) that runs in the browser canvas.

**Refinement Loop:**
1. Critique: Analyze implementation against SOTA benchmarks.
2. Optimize: Check for GPU compute opportunities and zero-copy data transfer.
3. Polish: Increase visual complexity until performance guardrails are hit.

**Performance Guardrails:**
- Target 60fps on Reference Hardware (M1 Air).
- Monitor WASM heap growth and cleanup.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify canvas renders background color and maintains target FPS.

tasks.title: Phase 2: Connection - Connect Audio Data to Visuals
tasks.description: Connect Audio data to Visuals using IAMF or WebAudio API.
tasks.details:
Search for 'WebAudio API analyzer examples' or 'Rust DSP crates'. Implement real-time audio frequency data extraction and pass it to the visualizer.

**Refinement Loop:**
1. Critique: Analyze latency and responsiveness.
2. Optimize: Use SharedArrayBuffer/Ring Buffers for data sync.
3. Polish: Map audio to SDF parameters for fluid deformations.

**Performance Guardrails:**
- Input-to-Visual latency < 50ms.

tasks.title: Phase 1: Stabilization - Core Optimization
tasks.description: Implement critical optimizations for SOTA performance.
tasks.details:
- Fix WGPU v24 `limits` and `cache` structs.
- Implement `BlobUniform` to stop mesh recreation lag.
- Finalize `load_model_from_bytes` using the low-level parser fix.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify consistent 60fps during blob movement and model loading.

tasks.title: Phase 2: Integration - Time & Physics Sync
tasks.description: Connect the physical world (Time, Cursor) to the digital world.
tasks.details:
- Connect JS Date() to Rust `set_environment_light`.
- Connect Rust `get_blob_screen_position` to HTML UI repulsion logic.
- Update Renderer.astro to drive Time-of-Day lighting from JS.
- Update Renderer.astro to use Blob Screen Position for UI effects.
- Implement visible 'Day XX:XX' time display in HTML.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify lighting changes with time/simulated time. Verify UI elements move away from the blob. Verify time display updates correctly.

tasks.title: Phase 3: Polish - Atmospheric Perfection
tasks.description: Final visual tuning for the 'Dreamworld' aesthetic.
tasks.details:
- Tune the 'Hemispheric' light gradient to perfectly match the CSS background.
- Add 'Soft Shadows' (simulated via darkened ground ambient color).
tasks.testStrategy: Visual inspection of blending between 3D and DOM layers.
